attributes.action: Community in S8 say no to sex shop
attributes.additional_details:
A business use application was submitted to Sheffield City Council on 17th September 2014 for a licence to use 47-49 Chesterfield Road, Sheffield, S8 0RL as a Sex Shop. Any objections are to be logged with Sheffield City Council within 28 days of the application.

We the undersigned object to the property aforementioned being opened as a sex shop
within our community. The S8 community are a strong family focused community and do not feel a business of this nature has any place within our community. We formally place our objections to this business use.
